config.tacz_eo.title: TACZ - Enchantment Overhaul Config
config.tacz_eo.category.enchantment_bala: Settings related to balancing the enchantments added by this mod.
config.tacz_eo.option.base_enchantabilit: The minimum enchantability required to obtain the first level of the enchantment.
config.tacz_eo.option.level_enchantabili: The additional enchantability required for each subsequent level of the enchantment.
config.tacz_eo.option.enchantability_spa: When added to the base and level enchantability, this value determines the maximum enchantability where the enchantment can be obtained.
config.tacz_eo.category.enchantment_bala: Increases projectile damage based on the enchantment level when a headshot is landed.
Increases projectile armour penetration based on the enchantment level.
Increases projectile damage based on the enchantment level.
Reduces projectile spread based on the enchantment level.
Increases projectile penetration through entities based on the enchantment level.
config.tacz_eo.category.enchantment_whit: Settings related to whitelisting which weapons can use verious enchantments.
Due to limitations with YACL, to add or remove an enchantment from the below list, you must edit the config file directly located at: config/tacz_enchantments_overhaul.json5
config.tacz_eo.option.enchantment_whitel: Guns that can be enchanted with %s. Use the format 'packid:gunid' to specify items. Example: 'tacz:aug'.
